tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE malware_forensics_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    file_name VARCHAR(255),
    file_size INT,
    file_type VARCHAR(50),
    upload_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE MalwareSamples (
    sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    file_name VARCHAR(255),
    file_size INT,
    md5_checksum VARCHAR(32),
    detection_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE ForensicReports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_id INT,
    analyzed_by VARCHAR(100),
    analysis_result TEXT,
    report_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE malware_files (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    file_name VARCHAR(255),
    file_type VARCHAR(50),
    file_size INT,
    scan_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE malware_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    file_id INT,
    report_text TEXT,
    report_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (file_id) REFERENCES malware_files(id)
);

CREATE TABLE malware_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id INT,
    analysis_result TEXT,
    analysis_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (report_id) REFERENCES malware_reports(report_id)
);

CREATE TABLE malware_samples (
	sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	file_hash STRING,
	file_type STRING,
	file_size INT,
	detection_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE forensic_reports (
	report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	sample_id INT,
	device_id INT,
	report_date DATE,
	analysis_results STRING
);

CREATE TABLE malware_samples (
    sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id INT,
    sample_name VARCHAR(255),
    sample_hash VARCHAR(64),
    sample_size INT
);
